Articles.Content:
i hv been there before 0.21

--

but when i was trying to get there to see if they changed anything in the 0.21 patch; i couldnt find it in the desert anymore.

can someone confirm if it's still there?
Last I heard it was clipped under the ground :l
Oh dear, i do hope most of these easter eggs don't disappear, i have yet to visit any of them apart from a Mun arch i found.
Same here. I only found a few odd squad logo thingies.
The Monolith by KSC is now 1 Kerbal off the ground, haven't found/checked any of the others.

The Monolith by KSC is now 1 Kerbal off the ground, haven't found/checked any of the others.

Hold on a minute! Gonna check that!
I've looked for a few, it does appear not all of them have been adjusted for the new surface.

What's a good way of finding these. I was trying to find the one that's about 60km NE of KSC which is one i've been to before, and I couldn't find it for the life of me.

Short of cheats like ISA's Mapsat which has the coordinates pre-programmed how does one reasonably search for these things?

The second launch facility is still there, I think it's moved though as I'm sure it was more-north west of where it is in 0.21+

I saw some Mun arches so those are okay, I haven't checked how buried/floaty they are though.

What's a good way of finding these.

The ones that are underground now are quite hard to find even with ISA MapSat!
Monolith looks fine from here.

KSC-2 is in the same position but the terrain around it has changed dramatically. The desert temple is definitely no longer visible. I had a rover next to it in 0.20 that survived the transition to 0.21. Although I don't recall seeing cacti in the desert before.

Edited July 27, 2013 by Maddmatts

KSC-2 is in the same position but the terrain around it has changed dramatically. The desert temple is definitely no longer visible. I had a rover next to it in 0.20 that survived the transition to 0.21. Although I don't recall seeing cacti in the desert before.

They apparently tweaked the terrain scatter on Kerbin back to how it once was. For a few versions the Kerbin terrain scatter was extremely sparse with tree clusters and cacti being ridiculously rare.

I saw cacti in the desert in 0.20...but only after reloading a mission in progress. Same thing with other scatters: if I had run continuously since starting the flight, there was practically no scatter; after I exited to Tracking Center, did other stuff, and came back, there was suddenly lots of scatter.

Maybe the 0.21 tweaks mostly corrected this problem, rather than turning up the frequency overall?
The Memorial is still there and the scenery around it is stunning! (even upside down!)
I found the pyramid. But it is underground. I was clipping through the mountains and I just spotted it.

In the final builds of 0.21 I checked the Pyramid and it was still there, but there were some changes to the terrain after that, so it's not unlikely that it was accidentally buried.

The trouble is that checking all the Easter Eggs is pretty time-consuming to do and can only really be done late in Testing, when we have more high-priority things to be testing.

Monolith looks fine from here.

OK, is it just me or does that look like a stylized drawing of conan o'brian looking to the left along with the word "Conan" at the bottom ???? (!)

In the final builds of 0.21 I checked the Pyramid and it was still there, but there were some changes to the terrain after that, so it's not unlikely that it was accidentally buried.

The trouble is that checking all the Easter Eggs is pretty time-consuming to do and can only really be done late in Testing, when we have more high-priority things to be testing.

That's okay. I love the new terrain changes, especially with mountains being much more dangerous(RIP Scott Kerman). I have faith you guys will follow-up and fix the wonderful easter eggs. Right now we got awesome scenery on Kerbin, the Mun, and other places to explore to keep us occupied. I love the new area around the Armstrong monument.
I miss my favorite landing site. I'm sure the kerbalnauts wish to pray to something after making it back home.

OK, is it just me or does that look like a stylized drawing of conan o'brian looking to the left along with the word "Conan" at the bottom ???? (!)

It's the Squad monkey, and the text reads "SQUAD"

Discovered the Space Kraken today! =D !! Very first time too!

And obviously still here
Any word on the North Pole UFO? Spent half the durn day flying in circles looking for it right where the mapsat MOD (not cheat) said it should be.
Nah I did the same and I cant find it either... I spent hours looking... Ill give south a try and see what's down there.
Can't find the Duna pyramid, or the rover camera - but the face is intact.
